rules_text: {X}{G}, {T}, Sacrifice another creature: Put X +1/+1 counters on Dickson and it becomes a Giant Soldier. Search your library, hand, and/or graveyard for a planeswalker or creature card with mana value less than or equal to Dickson’s power and put it onto the battlefield. If you searched your library this way, shuffle. Activate only once and only as a sorcery.
notes: 2.1.0: Changed Dickson around to just flow better (hopefully) Now with 20% less math!
